metadata.description: Alexander's lifetime Claude Code ecosystem with plugins for CI verification, code review, and intelligent commits.

plugins.name: autonomous-ci
plugins.description: Utilities and skills to verify CI locally and monitor GitHub Actions runs.

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Automated code review with security scanning, style checking, and improvement suggestions.

plugins.name: metacognitive-guard
plugins.description: Cognitive amplification stack: prevents hallucinations via epistemic hooks, competitive code review, fact-checking, and deep-thinking agents.

plugins.name: otelwiki
plugins.description: OpenTelemetry documentation with auto-sync. Semantic conventions, collector config, .NET instrumentation.

plugins.name: dotnet-architecture-lint
plugins.description: Enforces .NET build patterns: Version.props symlinks, CPM, and single-owner imports. Prevents AI agents from breaking centralized version management.

plugins.name: completion-integrity
plugins.description: Prevents shortcuts when completing tasks: blocks commits with warning suppressions, commented tests, deleted assertions. Detects premature completion claims.

plugins.name: workflow-tools
plugins.description: Multi-agent workflow orchestration: /fix (unified fix pipeline), /red-blue-review (adversarial security), /tournament (competitive coding), /mega-swarm (parallel audit), /deep-think (extended reasoning), /batch-implement (parallel implementation).

plugins.name: hookify
plugins.description: User-configurable hooks from .local.md files. Define blocking and warning rules for Bash commands, file edits, and session events.

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Guided feature development with codebase understanding and clean architecture focus.

plugins.name: ancplua-project-routing
plugins.description: Auto-routes to specialist agents based on current project directory. Injects context for ErrorOrX, Analyzers, SDK, qyl (includes servicedefaults), Template, and plugin repos.

plugins.name: exodia
plugins.description: Multi-agent workflow orchestration as skills: turbo-fix, fix, fix-pipeline, tournament, mega-swarm, deep-think, batch-implement, red-blue-review, hades (Smart cleanup with audit trail). Skills-standard counterpart to workflow-tools.
